attributes.additional_details:
5 GCSES SHOULD BE FREE FOR ALL AGES!
They are the requirments for LEVEL 3/ A- LEVEL, DEGRESS, TO SUSTAIN A JOB ETC.

People may not have their GCSES for many reasons, like family problems, exclusions, being builed at school, or not getting the grades they need. So however after we are 19 they have to pay riduculaus amounts to re do them. WHY?

GCSES SHOULD BE FREE, AND WITH YOUR HELP THIS CAN HAPPEN! 5 GCSES AND LEVEL 3 COURSE SHOULD BE FREE, regardless of age! ONCE PEOPLE HAVE THEIR 5 GCSES, ITS UP TO THEM!
